column4: I'm trying to install adesklets-0.6.1 and when i ./configure i get the message that "c compiler cannot creat executables"  anybody know what that means?  sorry im kinda new
have you installed the build-essential package?
must not because i dont even know what that is, =P
ok, do     sudo apt-get install build-essential    then try to ./configure again (also say my name if you're talking to me, otherwise I'll probably miss it. this is a pretty busy channel)
___yy:  ok it's installing right now, thank you very much!
ahh, i need python as well
you should be able to apt-get that as well

or you can use the synaptic package manager to search for/install it if you're more comfortable in a GUI. apt-get and synaptic get packages from the same place, so It's not like you're missing anything using one or the other
ok, i already have v2.5 but for somereason the adesklets doesn't see it
I can't help you with that, sorry. That's an adesklets specific problem, and I've never used adesklets.
ok, well i would just use gdesklets but it says it cant connect to the server?
sorry, I've never used gdesklets either. I would guess it probably means it can't connect to your X server (the thing that manages window resources for you) but I don't know how to fix it.
ok, thank you for the clues =)
I don't think that should affect it really
that matters more for things like drivers
i got all the hard stuff done =P  wireless, video, etc... i figured this would be easy hehe
